name: Football Bros
description:
More than 15 million downloads is what we'd like to reach with Football Bros! Until then, you'll have to see for yourself that it's an incredibly fun and casual game, different from the others with controls that have never been seen until now. All you have to do is "Tap" on the sides of the screen to move the 2 players at the same time and move past your opponents without losing the ball. It may seem easy at the beginning, but will you be able to beat the game and unlock all of the current and legend players that await you?

Put your skills to test with the game that could possibly be the best casual football game in history.
